name: Combo Sphere
description:
Submission for the Extra Credits Game Design Jam 2018. Time spent: 8 hours.

Credits:

  • Swirly Effects by ashishlko11, on OpenGameArt: https://opengameart.org/content/free-game-fx
  • Hit Spark by Sinestesia, on OpenGameArt: https://opengameart.org/content/hit-animation-frame-by-frame
  • Stone Texture by 3DFancy, on Unity Asset Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/roads/stone-floor-te...
  • Background by Code Inferno Games, on OpenGameArt: https://opengameart.org/content/sky-space-and-zeppelin-backgrounds
